title: Friend needs to recover their account
body: Hey, guys. Recently, my friend has hit 16 champions and was ready to play ranked but this morning, cannot log into their account. They have sent a support ticket to Riot as they cannot change their details. Riot is bound to ask for proof that they own the account, what type of proof does my friend need to give for their account back?

replies.body:
Any information that isn't available simply by looking at the account is useful in verifying ownership (i.e a list of skins you own isn't going to help at all, and is just a waste of everyone's time, but the first IP purchase made on the account [provided it is old enough to not show in purchase history] is going to help.

Support will send them a list of questions to verify the account, they don't all need to be answered, but most of them do, assuming he was the original owner of the account he should be able to answer enough of those questions with no real trouble.
